title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo in the Photon version, the Combo does not receive focus. It only gains focus when the dropdown list is opened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog.
2. Press the "Tab" key.
3. Notice that the focus moves to the second Combo labeled "Repository Path:".
